name: Knotted Nets
text: You are capable of entangling far greater prey with the help of your allies.
prerequisites: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (net), base attack bonus +1.
benefit: If you ready an attack with a net to entangle a creature when an ally of your size who also has this feat attempts to entangle that creature with a net, the two of you can entangle the creature as if you were one size category larger. The entangled creature can attempt to escape both nets as though they were a single net, using the lower of the nets’ hit points, hardness (if any), and DCs to break or escape. Only you or your ally can attempt to control the entangled creature’s movement with an opposed Strength check, but your ally grants you a +1 bonus on the check. If you work with three other allies of the same size who have this feat, you can entangle a creature as if you were two size categories larger. If you work with seven other allies in this way, you can instead entangle a creature as if you were three size categories larger.
normal: A net is useful against only creatures within one size category of you.
text_zh: 在你盟友的帮助下你可以缠住更大的猎物。
benefit_zh:
当和你同一体型的盟友使用捕网进行攻击来纠缠一个生物，且如果你以准备动作使用捕网进行攻击来纠缠那个生物，在纠缠生物时你们两个会被视作大一个体型。被纠缠的生物可以将两个网当成一个那样同时尝试逃脱，使用两个网之中较低的HP，硬度（如果有）和用以破坏或逃脱的DC。只有你和你的盟友可以通过力量对抗来控制被纠缠生物的移动，但是你的盟友在这次检定中会获得+1加值。

如果你和其他三个和你同体型并拥有这个专长的盟友合作，在纠缠生物时你们的体型被视作大两个体型。如果你和其他七个和你同体型并拥有这个专长的盟友合作，在纠缠生物时你们的体型被视作大三个体型。
normal_zh: 捕网只能对和你同体型的生物使用。
